impact-statement: Acute one-hour treatment of <italic>Pik3ca</italic> mutant mice with a novel anti-epilepsy drug suppresses seizures despite continued developmental brain dysmorphology, promising a new therapeutic strategy for patients with intractable pediatric epilepsy.
